snippet: India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin was named the International Cricket Council (ICC) Cricketer of the Year on Thursday for taking 48 wickets and scoring 336 runs in eight tests during the voting period....
lead_paragraph: India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin was named the International Cricket Council (ICC) Cricketer of the Year on Thursday for taking 48 wickets and scoring 336 runs in eight tests during the voting period.

headline.main: Ashwin Bags Brace of ICC Annual Awards
headline.print_headline: Ashwin Bags Brace of ICC Annual Awards
